description: Rename GoRalph to Hal - Full rename of CLI tool from GoRalph to Hal with HAL 9000 personality touches

userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Go module path updated to github.com/jywlabs/hal so that the module identity matches the new name.
acceptanceCriteria: go.mod module directive reads 'module github.com/jywlabs/hal'

go build ./... succeeds with no import errors
